dashboardView.title: Ethereum Lite Explorer
dashboardView.subTitle: An open source Ethereum block explorer. Available on {gitHubLink}
blockView.content.noData.text:
It seems there is no data to display.
Try searching for a different block.
blockView.content.dataNotLoaded.text: Data is still being processed. Please be patient
blockView.content.blockNumber.label: Block
blockView.content.inconsistentWarning.te: Due to a bug we encountered in Parity, we were not able to fully process this block so data might be temporarily incomplete. We are working on fixing this
blockView.content.parentHash.label: Parent
blockView.content.blockSize.label: Size
blockView.content.uncles.label: Uncles
blockView.content.txTrie.label: Tx trie
blockView.content.sha3Uncles.label: SHA3Uncles
blockView.content.beneficiary.label: Mined by
blockView.content.difficulty.label: Difficulty
blockView.content.extraData.label: Extra data
blockView.content.mixHash.label: Mix hash
blockView.content.receiptsTrie.label: Receipts Trie
blockView.content.logsBloom.label: Logs bloom
blockView.content.transactions.label: Transactions
txTooltip.value.label: Value
blockView.content.basic.help: See basic information about the block - its number, time since it was mined, uncles and parent (yes, the whole family) and the percentage of transactions in this block which called on a smart contract.
blockView.content.transactions.help:
Get an in-depth view for all transactions within this block. Hover over the circles to see transaction data: the Tx address, its value and wallet addresses involved. The size of the circles varies depending on their relative value, compared to other transactions in the block.
To switch from graphic to table view, click on the striped button at the top.
blockView.content.advanced.help: See details about the miner who processed this block: duration, gas cost, difficulty and reward value.
blockView.content.logsBloom.help: This is a matrix view of all transactions from this block. Highlighted transactions indicate the presence of a log. Find out more about logs bloom here.

txView.content.erc20.unknownToken.label: (Unknown Token)
txView.content.inputData.label: Input data
txView.content.error.label: Error
txView.content.basic.help: Get an overview of this transaction, with primary information about: transaction number and value, time since execution, associated block, sender and receiver wallet addresses, position in the block distribution.
txView.content.advanced.help: See how this transaction performed, in terms of gas cost, as an absolute value and in comparison with gas consumption across the network.
txView.content.txSummary.label: Summary
txView.content.txSummary.logEvents.label: Log Entries
txView.content.txSummary.help: See full public details about the transactionâ€™s contract, tokens involved and its log. Activate the graph view for an easier overview.
txView.content.decodedPayload.help: Check the input data for this transaction (message call or contract initialization data). Data is available for CallTx and CreateTx transactions.
